Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Application no. 20035137 HAM, an Urban Development Action Area Project, located at 222 East 13th Street, Council District no. 2, Borough of Manhattan.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant to Article 16 of the New York General Municipal Law, at the request of the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development.

Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 020646 PPK, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter concerning the disposition of two city-owned properties, located in Community Board 3, Borough of Brooklyn, Council Districts no. 34 and 36.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.

Uniform land use review procedure, application no. C 020070 MMQ, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, changes to the City Map, Borough of Queens, Council District no. 32.  This application is subject to Council review and action only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by a vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter and §11.20 of the Rules of the Council.

Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. 020071 ZMQ, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning changes to the zoning map, Borough of Queens, Council District no. 32.

Landmarks Preservation Commission designation no. DL - 341, LP - 2122, pursuant to §3020 of the New York City Charter, concerning the designation of the Tribecca South Historic District Extension, located at generally bounded by West Broadway to the west, Chambers Street to the north, Church Street to the east, Murray Street to the south , Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 1, as a landmark.  (Non-ULURP no. 20035120 HKM).
Items.MatterName: Landmarks, Tribecca South Historic District Extention, Manhattan (Non-ULURP no. 20035120 HKM)
